title: History Extra podcast - January 2009 - Part 2
itunes:title: History Extra podcast - January 2009 - Part 2
itunes:subtitle: Professor Robert Crawford giving us a taste of the poetry of Robert Burns, Richard Serjeantson talks about the Elizabethan courtier and polymath Francis Bacon.
description:
Professor Robert Crawford giving us a taste of the poetry of Robert Burns, Richard Serjeantson talks about the Elizabethan courtier and polymath Francis Bacon.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
